headline: Hasbro: Growth In EBITDA Expected Realistic Despite Tariff Risk
summary: Hasbro's WotC fuels growth with hits like Baldur's Gate 3. Trading at a blended PE of 24x, Hasbro offers up to 20% upside. See more on HAS stock here.
